sentences.sentence: The shelves were chock-a-block with ornaments.
Even Cleopatra used gold ornaments to enhance her charm.
sentences.translation: 就连克利奥帕特拉也用金饰来增加她的魅力。

sentences.sentence: There were curious pieces of furniture and curious ornaments in nearly all of them.
sentences.translation: 几乎所有的房间里都有奇怪的家具和奇怪的装饰品。
